definition: A person who performs tasks or services in exchange for compensation, typically in a professional or occupational setting. This term is commonly used to refer to individuals who are employed by a company or organization, and it specifically emphasizes their role as workers or employees.

examples.german: Arbeitnehmer sind Personen, die in einem Arbeitsverhältnis stehen.
examples.english: Employees are individuals who are in an employment relationship.

examples.german: Der Arbeitnehmer hat Anspruch auf Urlaub und Krankengeld.
examples.english: The employee is entitled to vacation and sick pay.
Employees must document their working hours.

examples.german: Der Arbeitnehmer hat das Recht auf Lohnfortzahlung im Krankheitsfall.
examples.english: The employee has the right to continued payment of wages in case of illness.

examples.german: Arbeitnehmer haben das Recht auf geregelte Pausenzeiten.
examples.english: Employees have the right to regulated break times.
